item.title: Esp8266 Driven Oven Controller Over Web Ui
item.description: !!! WARNING: This project deals with mains power and high current !!! Please be careful if you wish to replicate any of its functionality and never work on a PCB or any open wires that are connected to the mains ! Author has no responsibility for your safety and wellbeing, so please take care of yourself. How it works The purpose of this project is to control a heater of any sort to facilitate SMT reflow soldering utilizing a predefined temperature profile.
